p: Nanomaterials possess unique characteristics due to their size and high surface-area-to-volume ratio. Moreover, nanosized-medicinal plants can occur in association with modifications of their physical and chemical characteristics [ 35]. Natural based-products can be used directly to treat wounds or as carriers for drug delivery [ 33]. The efficacy of nanostructured medicinal plants warrants a comprehensive review of both plant-based nanomaterials obtained by different methods and their therapeutic targets in regulating the wound-healing process [ 33, 36].
